channel.title: Updated no mapdata client(great client base)
channel.description:
same as last 1 i posted except i added bloobooms gui stuff ect now loads mapdata if you have it if you dont it doesnt load mapdata!(more of a crash fix now lol)
[url=http://www.screencast.com/users/erand/folders/Jing/media/f9325c40-c8a4-4fdc-97c8-a5c83f847801]vid of me testing on a server with no mapdata loading(srry i was lagging) [/url]
pics: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24y8jev.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/351afrk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/30bfnzn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28l3lar.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ipocxk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14cfp52.png[/img]
as u can see it loads mapdata when it can but doesnt have to :P
client [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gnnzjwmmdjz]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gnnzjwmmdjz[/url]
cache installer http://www.mediafire.com/?nwmudazyvmt
